titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, Records of the Dean Concerning Faculty
School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, Records of the Dean Concerning Faculty
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:40

did.unittitle: School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, records of the dean concerning faculty

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of faculty promotion and appointment files maintained by the dean of the Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. School of Forestry and Environmental Studies

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 24-A (YRG 24-A), Central records and records of the dean of the Yale School of Forestry.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred by the School of Forestry and Environmental Studies Dean's Office, 2006-2008, 2014.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, Records of the Dean Concerning Faculty (RU 1014). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of faculty promotion and appointment files maintained by the dean of the Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

controlaccess.subject: College teachers
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. School of Forestry and Environmental Studies

did.unittitle: Records of the dean of the School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, concerning faculty
Faculty Advisor Committee re: Centers and Programs
Centers and Programs Policies and Procedures
Appointments/Reappointments Presented Yearly to Deputy Provost
Yale Corporation Appointments, Voted and Approved
Environmental Management and Policy (Joint FES-SOM) (2000-2001) -1st Stage Letter -Responses
Senior Forestry (2000-2001) -Stage II Letter Responses: Oliver, Chad
Aquatic Ecology (2002-03) -Responses to Stage I Letters
Aquatic Ecology (2002-03) -Stage I Letter and Recipients
Aquatic Ecology (2002-03) -Responses to Stage II Letter
Aquatic Ecology (2002-03) -Stage 2 Letters to New Respondents
Aquatic Ecology (2002-03) -Stage 2 Letters to Stage 1 Respondents
Hydrology (2003-04) -Final Response to Stage 1 and 2 Letter Writers
Hydrology (2003-04) -Review Committee Report and Supporting Materials
Environmental Social Science (2004-05) -Requests for Letters of Support
Environmental Social Science (2004-05) -CVs for FES Faculty Review
Short-Term Faculty Reports on Current Year Activities

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted 75 years from date individual leaves Yale
